title: ‘Sell America’ Trade Risk Fades Under Warsh’s Fed, Fulcrum Says
description: The nomination of Kevin Warsh as the next Federal Reserve chair diminishes the risk of a sweeping selloff in US assets as he is expected to guard against inflation, according to Fulcrum Asset Management.
content: The nomination of Kevin Warsh as the next Federal Reserve chair diminishes the risk of a sweeping selloff in US assets as he is expected to guard against inflation, according to Fulcrum Asset Management.
